mapper.update: update scientificResearch_horizontalTopicProjects set classTeacher = #{classTeacher,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, character = #{character,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, startTime = #{startTime,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, estimatedClosingTime = #{estimatedClosingTime,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, result = #{result,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, classTeacher, status, name, source, character, money, startTime, estimatedClosingTime, result, note, year from scientificResearch_horizontalTopicProjects where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
